Detailed Description

Class to handle the accumulated statistics output. Taken from app/didss/src/Validator and reformatted a little - the idea being that we want to keep the output format the same as it was for Validator.

Author:
Niles Oien

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

statistician::statistician ( string  name,
time_t  startTime,
string  outDir,
int  outputInterval 
)

The constructor. Sets up for the long road ahead.

Parameters:
name The name of this statistician. Used in output file names and directory names.
startTime Time to start output data interval bins.
outDir Output directory - we append the name to this as a subdir.
outputInterval The output interval, seconds.
Returns:
None.
Author:
Niles Oien oien@ucar.edu

time_t  truthTime

Accumulate the results of another truth/forecast pair.

Parameters:
numNon The number of non events.
numFail The number of failures (or misses).
numFalse The number of false alarms.
numHit The number of hits.
truthTime The truth time for this data pair.

None.
